titleStmt.title: A treatise of the lavvfulnes of hearing of the ministers in the church of England: penned by that late learned and reverent deuine, Mr. Iohn Robinsz. late pastor to the new English church of God in Leyden. Printed according to the copie that was found in his studie after his decase [sic]: and now published for the common good. Together with a letter written by the same authore: and approued by his church: vvhich followeth after this treatise
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, 1575?-1625.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
